name: A curved voidplate greatshield
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence noticably.
It increases the users hitpoints adequately.
It has decent armour class for its type (weak in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
